attributes.action: MPs in a leave constituency must vote to leave the EU
attributes.background: A referendum was held , the majority of people chose to leave the EU, MPs from leave constituancies should act with integrity, representing voters rather than overruling them and work with the Prime Minister to ensure the UK leaves the EU.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
